snippet: President Obama planned to discuss economic and trade matters, the drug war and immigration, the most delicate topic, when he meets with President Enrique Peña Nieto.
abstract: Pres Obama plans to discuss delicate topic of immigration, among other issues, in meeting with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto during state trip to Mexico.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and RANDAL C. ARCHIBOLD
byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Randal C. Archibold from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: President Obama planned to discuss economic and trade matters, the drug war and immigration, the most delicate topic, when he meets with President Enrique Peña Nieto.

headline.seo: Immigration Is on Agenda for Obama in Mexico
headline.main: Immigration Is on Agenda for Obama in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Immigration Is on Agenda For Obama In Mexico
